section.title: 病情摘要
section.text: 主觀描述、客觀描述及評估

section.title: 主觀描述
section.text: 去病史:PSY ; 家族史:無; 藥物過敏史:PYRIN,DECADRON,CLINDAMUYCIN,B-IODINE;steroid; TALEX; SULFADRUG- mens irregularlly 旅遊史:無; 職業:工 抽菸:無 喝 酒:無 嚼檳 榔:無 身高:160 CM 體重:65 KG 血 型:B ITCHY THROAT, FB SENSATION IN THROAT FOLLOWED BY HARD DRY COUGH, DOE, UPPER ABD PAIN, FULLNESS FOR MS WITH AE RECENTLY AND EVEN NAUSEA, VOMITING ELICITED RECENTLY ALBEIT PPI --> PRIOR IMPROVED BY SELF PAY PPI; BUT OKWE SEEMS WORSENING ITCHY SKIN RASHES RECENTLY; TALEX INDUCING ITCHY SKIN RASHES -->SUGGEST TAPERING IF GOOD CONTROL OF GERD. SHE REFUSED TO DC TALEX POOR RESPONSE TO RICH GRADUALLY-->IMPROVED BY PANHO + prn use of kowell ROUTINE CHECK IN THIS OCT. SONO: MODERATE FATTY LIVER SKIN RASH OFF AND ON WITH AE RECENTLY TACHYCARDIA, BW LOSS 1 KG, FATIGUE FOR 1 M DRY COUGH FOR DAYS
